Module: main

Main Blend4Web module. Implements methods to initialize and change the global params of the engine.
Source:
  • ext/main.js, line 3

            fps_callback(fps_avg, phy_fps_avg)

            FPS callback
            Parameters:
            Name Type Description
            fps_avg Number Averaged rendering FPS
            phy_fps_avg Number Averaged physics FPS (not implemented, always 0)
